title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.17 - Payment where no wagering on a position
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.17 - Payment where no wagering on a position

State Regulations
(a) If there is no money wagered on the
winner to win, the win pool shall be refunded. (b) If no money has been wagered to place on
a horse that is placed first or second in a race, the place pool for that race
shall be apportioned among the holders of the place tickets on the other horse
that was placed first or second. (c) If no money has been wagered to show on a
horse that has placed first, second or third in a race, the show pool in that
race shall be apportioned among the holders of show tickets on the other horses
that are placed first, second or third in that race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
